DBD is a unique game.
It has so much going for it - its easy to learn hard to master.
It had so SO many horror IP's its starting to reach Super Smash levels of impressive.
The dynamics and perk system of the game is so wide spread it allows customisation for many different ways to play.

But...
The way the game is structured as an asymmetrical game both sides can often feel powerless to determine the outcome of a game - its a big swing between fun and enduring games.
It can leave you feeling happy and horrible with little to help you improve beyond practice.

The community can be very provoking post game also due to the above circumstances.

I enjoy the game - would I wish it on my friends? No.
Update your game and LISTEN to your player feedback BHVR wtf.

Good game makes fun but sometimes I just want to destroy my desk.
idk why killers always got buff every update bruhhhhhhhhhhhhh

Game is more stressful than brain surgery, community is extremely toxic, and the Devs don't care about there player base. 

11/10 I play 6-14 hours a day.

The game is really fun but only if you're playing with friends. The solo queue is atrocious and I do not recommend it if you are a survivor. Even with the toxic people who play, a few rounds with friends is great fun.

Pretty fun, lots of unique killers that are fun to play. Personally I like Myers and Nemesis, but I will likely pick up on other killers as well. Survivors aren't really unique aside from their appearance and their unique perks, since all of them can use the same perks given the proper time put into leveling characters up, and all of them can use the same items and do the same things. Putting that aside, I still do like picking some survivors over others, like Bill or Dwight mostly. Survivor can be very stressful in the face you need to hide from the killer and not get caught, while also working towards your objective so you and/or your teammates can leave. On the other hand, Killer can be stressful in the sense that there are a lot of generators and Survivors to keep track of, and even more so when multiple generators are getting done and you have very few hooks, if any at all. But personally, I like to play Killer more than Survivor, since I have the ability to just play for fun and not worry about letting my teammates down, having them get mad at me for making a mistake, as with killer it's just you against 4 survivors. Playing Survivor can be rather refreshing every once in a while however, it's always good to have a change of pace sometimes. All in all, I'd definitely recommend the game if you like asymmetrical multiplayer games, but do check out some YouTube videos before buying, especially before buying DLC! One YouTube channel I can definitely recommend is "not Otzdarva", his content helped me learn a very large majority of what I know about this game, in the very little 5-6 weeks I've had it.

Ok The Game Is Fine Its Just The Shitty Company Who Owns It 
They Dont Like Fixing Shit I Just Came Back From A Break As A Rank 20 And Vs 5 Matches Of Vsing Red Ranks
What's not to like, you can either stab or get stabbed.

Devs has been complacent and lazy for far too long without any competition. The amount of bugs still happening to this day along with new ones is absurd and have decided that uninstalling is the only way forward as this game is just plain unenjoyable as Killer and bearable at best as Survivor.

Randomly have my game decide to leave the game window, random disconnect from the server. Lag spikes. Pretty good job so far!

This is the only game I've played where every time they "fix" bugs the game actually gets more unplayable.

UPDATE: 

I've recently uninstalled the game. Thanks to hackers at high MMR, the broken Boon Totems mechanic giving survivors infinite chances to use overpowered healing and stealth perks, and the game devs saying in an interview that they don't care about making a balanced game, it's pretty clear that BHVR has given up on making a game that's fun for people who enjoy playing the Killer role at all. I enjoy playing survivor, but if that's all I can play to have a good time I feel like I'm being robbed of half the game. 

TL;DR the game isn't fun anymore if you're not a dedicated survivor main and I didn't buy this game just to hold shift w and pallet bonk killers. I do not recommend this game.
